"I was wondering, have you had a chance: "Only on a video stream? Well, I guess that's okay."
"I really want to know what you thought about it!"
"Well, this is ARKS after all. I need to put on a good show for everyone."
"Um, saying something vague like that tells me absolutely nothing. What was good?"
"What? No way! What didn't you like?"
"To be honest, there are somethings about being an idol that I don't like."
"Sorry for randomly making you listen to my opinion. But when I'm on the stage, it doesn't feel like I'm there."
"It seems like there's someone who isn't me standing there."
"Sometimes I wonder, who exactly is everyone looking at?"
"Who is the person that everyone is cheering for?"
"But singing, singing is different. My voice is my own."
"My singing was the one thing that he would happily listen to."
"I don't know anything about the real me, or who I was, but I like singing, I think."
